question: There are 6 periods in the day for a normal student but Michael has to take 3 extra classes. Each class is 45 minutes long. He goes to class for 6 days a week. He then spends 1/2 of his weekly minutes each on Saturday and Sunday as extra learning time. How many hours a week does he spend learning?
answer:
He takes 6+3=<<6+3=9>>9 classes a day
That means he spends 45*9=<<45*9=405>>405 minutes per day in class
So he spends 405*6=<<405*6=2430>>2430 minutes a week
That means he spends 2430*1/2=<<2430*1/2=1215>>1215 minutes each on Saturday and Sunday.
So he spends 2430+1215+1215=<<2430+1215+1215=4860>>4860 minutes per week
So he spends 4860/60=<<4860/60=81>>81 hours per week
#### 81
